title: USB C (offee)
text: The wonders of the modern world: I had to recharge my coffee jar today :)

title: Happy New Year!
text:
Happy New Year, if it’s not too late to still be saying it :)
Tomorrow is the “official” start of my 2025, and the news is I’m going to start trying to write a bit more (I’ll let you decide whether that is good or bad news!).
It’ll eventually be hosted on Github Pages, but I think a blog with just one post looks a little sad so I’ll likely not click the button on that until there’s a little bit more there.
Also eventually, I hope it’ll be a mix of blog posts and longer articles, and I’m also trying to tie it into habit tracking rather than doing “traditional” resolutions this year.
Bye for now!
- Paul.

title: A few more details…
text:
To expand a little on what I said yesterday, the following things are definitely top of mind to cover:

the role(s) of planning in having impact
analogies from business to science (e.g. alignment with velocity)
a “patterns” viewpoint (maybe starting with Balanced Scorecard)
the tech behind the site when it lands!
